programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Bedtime - It’s nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but it’s been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Traffic Jam - Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep131
programme.desc: The Box of Secrets - Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Bubu's Robot - Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Pups Save the Sea Turtles / Pups and the Very Big Baby - Ryder, Chase, and Rubble hatch a plan to help sea turtle hatchlings safely cross the road to get to the beach! // There’s a beached baby whale in Adventure Bay! Can the Paw Patrol work together to reunite it with its mother?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Treasure Park/Baddy Long Legs - When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting! // Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a REAL crisis!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Kai Express / Ducknado - When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Paddington's Squirrel Surprise / Paddington Becomes a Secret Agent - Paddington accidentally destroys a squirrel's winter nut store, so he invites the wild animal to live indoors. Judy gets a toy spy kit. // Mrs. Bird starts acting suspiciously, so the children and Paddington decide to follow her using the spy gadets.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Bread - Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Pups Bear-ly Save Danny / Pups Save the Mayor's Tulips - Daring Danny X is at it again! This time he’s stuck in a tree over a deep canyon and is pursued by hungry bears. // Mayor Humdinger sabotages Mayor Goodway’s perfect petals for the tulip contest. Chase and Rocky to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep317
programme.desc: All Star Pups! / Pups Save Sports Day - It’s monkey mayhem as pups play kickball against Raimondo’s team, until an eagle steals the ball. // The All Star Pups are ready to compete in the summer sports day when Daring Danny X turns the field into an ice rink!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Lorelai's Bracelet / Cecelia And The Ghost Ship - Bonnie steals Lorelai's bracelet, turning herself into a mermaid and while trapping Lorelai in human form! // Santi and crew must overcome ghostly shenanigans to save Cecilia from the dreaded Ghost Ship

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoë Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it’s home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The New Car - The family car breaks down, so Peppa and her family rent a new one, but it starts acting crazy

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Treasure Hunt - Grandpa Pig hides some treasure in his garden, and when Peppa and George come, they have to look for it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Not Very Well - Peppa has chicken pox, and has to stay in bed until she gets better.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S04 Ep408
programme.desc: T-Rex Trouble - Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep225
programme.desc: Pups Save the Woof and Roll Show / Pups Save an Eagle - When a big pop star comes to town, a storm blows the whole town apart, including the stage! Can the PAW Patrol save the day? // While out in the woods, the pups rescue an eagle caught in twine and tied to her own nest!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Pups in a Jam / Pups Save a Windsurfing Pig - It’s the annual Jamboree Jamfest, but all of the fruit is carried off by ants! It's up to the pups to lure the ants to safety. // Zuma is on a wacky water rescue after Cornelius the pig goes for a ride on a windsurfing board.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Finship Trap - When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Paddington and The Meteor Shower / Paddington and The Talent Show - Paddington has three chances to take a photo of a meteor shower using Mr. Gruber's antique camera. // Paddington enters Mr. Brown into the Townhall talent contest. However, Mr. Brown gets stage fright and Paddington must come to the rescue.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called “Leo Lion”. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along. But George feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep242
programme.desc: Granny and Granpa's Attic - Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Mystery On The Guppy Express! - When Oona's Bubble Kitty goes missing aboard the Guppy Express, Detective Nonny steps in to help. Knowing the cat must be on board, they race to find her before the train reaches its next stop--and Bubble Kitty may be lost for good!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso / The Sea Dragon's Treasure - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure. // After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Bonnie's Mom - Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep917
programme.desc: Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties / Pups Save Helo Humdinger - When Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties, an alarm is set off and the Paw Patrol must rescue them. // Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions - an aircraft and must be rescued from an out-of-control flight.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep239

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep135
programme.desc: The Remember-ator - Froga can't seem to remember anything today! Even her piano lesson with Christopher! S+he decides to put sticky notes all around the house as reminders. But it is not very convenient! Bubu offers to be her reminder, friends the best reminders of all!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep136
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt - Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep215

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep204

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep110

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Double Trouble / Box Not So Clever - In order to win the Citizen of the Year, Sir Steel and Professor Scratch create holograms doubles of Deer Squad who cause chaos all around. // It's Recycling Day and Sir Steel puts the whole town in cardboard boxes with his Box-ooka device.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Pups Get Growing / Pups Save a Space Toy - Fertilizer causes Yumi’s crops to sprout huge veggies, so Ryder and the Paw Patrol must corral the stampeding produce! // The Paw Patrol draws a message on Farmer Al’s field to tell the space aliens the pups found their lost toy!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Magic Spyglass / The Stone of Life - Santi and crew are after the legendary Magic Spyglass! But things get tricky when Enrique Real de Palacios III joins the chase. / Santi and crew follow a map to a special treasure, but Bonnie and Sir Butterscotch are hot on their trail.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy / Caracol Cove - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend. // Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep222
programme.desc: The Sports Day - It is Sports Day at Peppa’s playgroup. There are lots of exciting events, including running, jumping and the “tug of war”. Daddy Pig tells Peppa that it’s not the winning that matters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep223

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Balloon Ride - Peppa wins the top prize in a raffle at school: a trip in a hot air balloon. Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb aboard and enjoy the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when it’s raining – but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now he’s more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when it’s not raining.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 12 - GWS Giants v Richmond Ep69
programme.desc: With just three wins for their first 10 matches, its been a tough start to the season for both GWS and Richmond. With their season on the line its a must win as the Giants host the Tigers in Western Sydney in Round 12.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep21
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel look ahead to Cricket's World Test Championship between Australia and India, the latest from the French Open, fallout from Origin 1 plus AFL and only six weeks until the FIFA Women's World Cup.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season - Round 12 - Essendon v North Melbourne Ep70
programme.desc: Essendon take on North Melbourne in the final match to complete Round 12. The Bombers are in a logjam with 14 clubs fighting for a Top 8 finish but their spirits were lifted lifted after a tight win in the Dreamtime match.

programme.title: Pacific Island Food Revolution - SWAG Market - Samoa Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - The delicious competition continues, this time with teams challenged to set up shop in our Samoa SWAG Challenge.

programme.title: Inside The Sydney Opera House - Back to Business Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's the start of a busy year at the Sydney Opera House as the Australian ballet returns. While a whirlwind of romance hits the house with 28 Valentine's Day weddings, disaster strikes and Vivid LIVE faces a washout.

programme.title: Great Southern Landscapes - Lakes Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Art lover Rachel Griffiths voyages to Kati Thanda - Lake Eyre to find the spot where John Olsen drew inspiration for his 1975 painting of Lake Eyre.

programme.title: And We Danced - Act 3: 2000 - 2020 Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The Australian Ballet entered the new millennium with a bold creative appointment. Fresh from the dancer's ranks and with no leadership experience, David McAllister took over from Ross Stretton as Artistic Director in 2001.

programme.title: Escape From The City - Hobart TAS: The Tungs Ep18
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Sydney couple Nancy and Jeremy have been captivated by Tasmania's charm and have decided to move their family down south. Their property hunt takes them to four different homes which offer plenty of space.

programme.title: Australian Story - A Brilliant Canvas - John Olsen Ep14
programme.desc: A story of art, fame and family. The late John Olsen, one of our most beloved painters, had an obsessive focus on his work, often casting a shadow on those around him. John and family open up about art and the cost of fame.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep45
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Landline Ep17
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Insiders Ep17
programme.desc: David Speers and the panel discuss the latest in Federal Politics including the key takeouts from the last week in parliament and what we learnt in Senate Estimates. Plus what might happen with interest rates and inflation.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep21
programme.desc: Kelli Underwood and the panel look ahead to Cricket's World Test Championship between Australia and India, the latest from the French Open, fallout from Origin 1 plus AFL and only six weeks until the FIFA Women's World Cup.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep20
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Sera Naiqama and Sam Wykes chat with North Queensland Cowboy Kulikefu Finefeuiaki. Plus creating pathways to AFL in the Pacific.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep20
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor presents the main international news of the week, as reported by ABC News correspondents deployed in Bangkok, Jakarta, Jerusalem, London, New Delhi, Port Moresby, Taipei, Tokyo and Washington.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep18
programme.desc: The RBA surprised many by raising the cash rate to 3.85% in May, the 11th rise in a year, after a pause in April. Rachel Pupazzoni looks at the week in finance and previews the Reserve Bank's June decision on interest rates.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep18
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep17
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep111
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest as Lisa Millar and Madeleine Morris bring you up to date on overnight developments and all the news you need to know this morning. Plus Emma Rebellato with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep111
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep111
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep15
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Clarence and Millie tour a transformed landscape, Costa visits a food rescue centre, Josh meets a productive duo, Tammy cares for fussy figs, Sophie has transplant tips, plus we meet a team keeping Indigenous languages alive.

programme.title: Outback Opal Hunters Ep4

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week: three-piece band ASTERISM, who are creating a buzz with metal covers of anisongs; and solo singer KIM SUNGJE, who's also in South Korean boy band SUPERNOVA.

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Ngoc-san, from Vietnam, wants to help a new coworker sitting next to him and become a great senior, Senpai. To know and understand the proper way, Ngoc-san will tackle a role-play.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Enjoy a warm kitty-welcome at the famous hot spring area! After visiting a popular cat duo at a ropeway station, stop by at a restaurant run by a kitty and its owner where you can also bathe.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Anime Manga Explosion
programme.desc: This time, we are featuring the timeless soccer manga, Captain Tsubasa. We talk to creator Takahashi Yoichi about the series' global popularity and find out how the super shots in the anime are made.

programme.title: U&I
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan's Top Inventions(28Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: home blood pressure monitors and test patterns.

programme.title: Bosai: Human Stampede
programme.desc: During the 2011 Great East Japan Earthquake, Tokyo, far from the epicenter, was flooded with people who could not get home. Find out how this could trigger another disaster known as a human stampede.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking, we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "The Algorithm March", etc.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the city of Valletta, the capital of the Republic of Malta. Designated as a World Heritage Site, it's a walled city built by Christian Knights during the 16th century.

programme.title: Road To UFC Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: ROAD TO UFC Season 2 is the most significant opportunity for Asia's top MMA prospects to make it to the world stage. The opening round is divided into four episodes, each of which includes four tournament bouts and one additional non-tournament bout. The event will be held in front of a live audience and the episodes will be produced and distributed for live broadcast using Remote Integration Model production (REMI) from UFC’s state-of-the-art Broadcast Operations Center (BOC) at UFC Apex in Las Vegas in the USA. The event will mark the first live UFC telecasts to be produced entirely remotely, utilizing the new IP-based, 4K-capable BOC and leveraging the expertise of UFC’s full-time production team.

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premio MotoGP™ Guru by Gryfyn de España Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The Spanish Grand Prix at the Circuito de Jerez is a colourful event which draws massive crowds from all over to watch the world’s best riders do battle in the sunshine of Andalusia. The Jerez circuit in southern Spain was built in 1986, hosted its first Grand Prix a year later and has remained on the MotoGP™ calendar ever since. As a nation, Spain has produced some great riders over the years such as Angel Nieto, Ricardo Tormo, Sito Pons, Alex Criville and Jorge Martinez “Aspar”. The likes of Jorge Lorenzo, Marc Marquez, Dani Pedrosa and Maverick Viñales now continue the Spanish success story in the premier class

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kara France vs Albazi
programme.desc: Prelims - Rapidly becoming the most exciting division in the UFC, the flyweight class will take center stage on June 3, when Kai Kara-France and Amir Albazi face off in a five-round UFC Fight Night main event at the APEX in Las Vegas. In the hunt for a shot at the title, New Zealand’s Kara-France has won three of his last four, living up to his “Don’t Blink” nickname with a blistering finish of former world champion Cody Garbrandt. But getting past Albazi will be no easy task, as the rising star has won all four of his UFC bouts, most recently an impressive knockout of Alessandro Costa

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kara France vs Albazi

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep908AdesanyavsWhittaker2
